channel.title: OutOfBounds Error
channel.description:
Ok, so I was on my server doing a stress test and every time I'd do a stress test I would get an out of bounds error... Specifically java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 11824.
It's never done this before, but I was logging in my bots 250 at 300ms. So I don't know if I was just logging them in too fast or what... Anyway, if anyone knows what could help me, that would be great! Thanks!

item.title: OutOfBounds Error
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“Christmas_tree, post:2, topic:478582”]I’m pretty sure this is due to the fact that the entire login is done through blocking. I’d suggest you removed your thread per client.

You could rip the code straight out of the server Clawz Fury worked on. Getting saving and loading to work for a novice is a bitch.

There’s no “simple fix”. wL is full of bollocks and there are so many places in a bog standard server where errors could be caused.[/quote]Im going to assume that you mean adamia. And I’ll do that then. I still have a lot more to sort out too. Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: OutOfBounds Error
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

I’m pretty sure this is due to the fact that the entire login is done through blocking. I’d suggest you removed your thread per client.

You could rip the code straight out of the server Clawz Fury worked on. Getting saving and loading to work for a novice is a bitch.

There’s no “simple fix”. wL is full of bollocks and there are so many places in a bog standard server where errors could be caused.

Read full topic
